name: Meks Easy Ads Widget
author: Meks

sections.description:
With this plugin you can create unlimited number of ads inside your WordPress widget. There are several smart options provided to customize ads for your needs.

Features

  • Create unlimited number of ads inside one widget
  • Choose from predefined sizes or define your custom size
  • Support for both image ads and script based ads
  • Randomize ads ordering
  • Limit number of ads per view (page load)
  • Autoplay rotate ads

Meks Easy Ads Widget plugin is created by Meks

Live example?

You can see Meks Easy Ads Widget live example on our Herald theme demo website
sections.installation:
1. Upload meks-easy-ads-widget.zip to plugins via WordPress admin panel or upload unzipped folder to your wp-content/plugins/ folder
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Appearance -> Widgets to add and setup the widget
